kobe.KBtrigger.trigger.coo¶

trigger.coo(self, *args, nside=512, **kwargs)¶

parse hpmap with ra, dec, error box

Parameters
coolist

[ra, dec, err]: ra, dec is the center of trigger while err is the estimated error box region

nsideint

healpix resolution

Other Parameters
———-
`savefits`, `wdir`, `coord`, `nest`, `clobber`

Examples

>>> from kobe import trigger
>>> a = trigger()       
# generate a skymap with center at ra=30 deg, dec=-20 deg, with 10 deg sky area
>>> a.coo([30, -20, 10])
>>> a.hpmap
array([8.92728175e-11, 8.92185286e-11, 8.91040539e-11, ...,
       6.12155463e-11, 6.08690152e-11, 6.10351951e-11])

sn_data_analysis: sdapy
